sys_hub_flow.description:
Create a Flow Data record with specified data definition.

Inputs:

  • Assignment Group - (Optional) Group required to provide flow data inputs.
  • Assigned To - (Optional) User required to provide flow data inputs.
  • User form for data collection - Data Definition of inputs.
  • Wait for user input - When checked, does not wait for flow data to be in a completed state.

Outputs:

  • Record - Flow Data Record.
  • Automated - True/False based on whether the flow waited for user input or not.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow"><sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><acls/><active>true</active><annotation/><callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api><category display_value="Activity Flows">f427c6ef1b230010affd0e55cc4bcb14</category><compiler_build>glide-rome-06-23-2021__patch9b-07-19-2022_08-04-2022_2150.zip</compiler_build><copied_from>30839b4b1b805010affd0e55cc4bcb83</copied_from><copied_from_name>Collect Data Activity</copied_from_name><description><p>Create a Flow Data record with specified data definition.</p>
<p><b>Inputs:</b></p>
<ul>
<li><b>Assignment Group</b> - (Optional) Group required to provide flow data inputs.</li>
<li><b>Assigned To</b> - (Optional) User required to provide flow data inputs.</li>
<li><b>User form for data collection</b> - Data Definition of inputs.</li>
<li><b>Wait for user input</b> - When checked, does not wait for flow data to be in a completed state.</li>
</ul>

<p><b>Outputs:</b></p>
<ul>
<li><b>Record</b> - Flow Data Record.</li>
<li><b>Automated</b> - True/False based on whether the flow waited for user input or not.</li>
</ul>

<p><b>Inputs:</b></p>
<ul>
<li><b>Assignment Group</b> - (Optional) Group required to provide flow data inputs.</li>
<li><b>Assigned To</b> - (Optional) User required to provide flow data inputs.</li>
<li><b>User form for data collection</b> - Data Definition of inputs.</li>
<li><b>Wait for user input</b> - When checked, does not wait for flow data to be in a completed state.</li>
</ul>

<p><b>Outputs:</b></p>
<ul>
<li><b>Record</b> - Flow Data Record.</li>
<li><b>Automated</b> - True/False based on whether the flow waited for user input or not.</li>
</ul>
